meanings.definition: Neuroglia: a type of cell in the nervous system that provides support and protection for neurons.
meanings.sent1: The neuroglia in the brain help keep the neurons safe.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study neuroglia to understand how they protect neurons.
meanings.sent3: The neuroglia threw a tiny party to celebrate keeping the neurons healthy.
meanings.sent4: The neuroglia are like the guardians of the nervous system, always watching over the neurons.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the neuroglia appear as tiny, protective shields around the neurons.
